Package sdds.lab1.task1

Class Encrypt

java.lang.Object
sdds.lab1.task1.Encrypt
public class Encrypt extends Object
Encrypt class is full-blown encryption class that takes care of encrypting the user input. It contains various functionalities that support the encryption scheme. TestEncrypt class instantiates a Encrypt instance and tests the encryption logic.
Since:
30/01/2022
Version:
1.0
Author:
Soham Thaker

  • Field Details

    • inputNum

      private final int inputNum
      inputNum holds the int value that the user enters in main and is then passed to the instance of this class in a constructor call

  • Constructor Details

    • Encrypt

      public Encrypt(String userInput)
      Constructor of Encrypt class accepts a String coming from main and then sets the private data member inputNum to the value of the param. This data member is used later on in encrypting the data.
      Parameters:
      userInput - String param that contains user's input.

  • Method Details

    • split

      private ArrayList<Integer> split()
      split function splits the user inputted integer into ArrayList for better encryption handling. It loops over the input until there is no remainder left after dividing the number with 10 everytime. It splits and adds the number at 0th location every time in the ArrayList so that we don't have to reverse it later. It is private since client doesn't need to know about the encryption logic.
      Returns:
      A reference to ArrayList object which will be used later on in the program.

    • replace

      private void replace(ArrayList<Integer> array)
      replace function performs the mathematical calculation for encrypting data. It adds each number in ArrayList object with 7 and then divides it by 10 to get the remainder which is then stored back into its respective index. It is private since client doesn't need to know about the encryption logic.
      Parameters:
      array - A reference to the ArrayList object passed to it from encrypt function.

    • swap

      private void swap(ArrayList<Integer> array)
      swap function performs swapping of indexes by swapping 0th index with 2nd and 1st index with 3rd so that the encryption logic is unbreachable. It is private since client doesn't need to know about the encryption logic.
      Parameters:
      array - A reference to the ArrayList object passed to it from encrypt function.

    • concat

      private String concat(ArrayList<Integer> array)
      concat function concatenates the encrypted value stored in ArrayList object to a String so that it can later be displayed to the user. It is private since client doesn't need to know about the encryption logic.
      Parameters:
      array - A reference to the ArrayList object passed to it from encrypt function.
      Returns:
      A String object that contains concatenated value of the encrypted number.

    • encrypt

      public String encrypt()
      encrypt function encrypts all the user input. It calls 4 methods, part of the Encryption class that helps us encrypt the user inputted data. This method is called by main which performs encryption logic on user input. It is public since client directly interacts with this function.
      Returns:
      encrypted String of numbers.
